short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View info about a glitch project

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Detects Glitch projects on and lets you switch between the following views:

* live app (e.g. hello-webpage.glitch.me)
* app listing page (e.g. glitch.com/~hello-webpage)
* editor view
